product_name: Sierra Designs Savage Soft-Shell Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Sierra Designs Savage Jacket offers reliable warmth and waterproof protection when you're on the go hiking up a steep trail or putting in a skin track on a snowy backcountry slope. Waterproof, breathable polyester fabric fends off light rain and snow showers. Warm polyester fleece lining is placed strategically around the jacket for good heat retention without bulk. Side-seam zippered vents go all the way to the hem so you can open up the sides of the jacket for excellent ventilation when you're working up a sweat. Hood is sized to fit over a ski or climbing helmet. Includes 2 zippered hand pockets, 1 zippered chest pocket and 1 interior zippered pocket. Closeout.
